akn:content.akn:p: Text Repealed by Acts 2021, Sp. Sess. I, c. 387, cl. 11, effective October 1, 2021. Annotations Cross references. For present provisions as to energy sources and policy, see Title 45.2, Subtitle V (§ 45.2-1700 et seq.). As to the Natural Gas Conservation and Ratemaking Efficiency Act, see § 56-600 et seq. Editors note. Acts 2021, Sp. Sess. I, c. 387 repealed and recodified former Titles 45.1 and 67 as Title 45.2. Where appropriate, the historical citations to former sections hav e been added to corresponding new sections.
